article_title: Hamas health ministry says 24 patients dead in two days at al-Shifa.
sentence: Hamas  health  ministry  says  24  patients  dead  in  two  days  at  al-Shifa.

article_title: Hamas health ministry says 24 patients dead in two days at al-Shifa.
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  has  said  that  24  patients  have  died  over  the  past  two  days  at  al-Shifa  hospital  due  to  power  cuts  caused  by  the  lack  of  fuel.
